basic.description: Advanced technical production studies involving sound, lighting, stage management, wardrobe, and carpentry. Students will participate in major departmental technical projects.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Applied Technical Production

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    Level 3 and (reg in a DRAM Major or Medial Plan, or COCA-CODR Sub-Plan, or STSC Spec. Plan) and (a grade of B- in  DRAM242 and DRAM246) and (a GPA of 2.60 in DRAM) or permission of the Dept.
Corequisite    DRAM247.
